rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de las imágenes del corpus
corpus image info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the image component of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: issn
Número Internacional Normalizado de Publicaciones Seriadas
ISSN
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The International Standard Serial Number used to identify a journal.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de los audios
audio classification info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on audio type/genre of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de gramática
language description type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of the language description.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información lingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: linguistic information
A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexical conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: manual de anotación
annotation manual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A bibliographic reference or ms:httpURI link to the annotation manual.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afiliación
affiliation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on organization to whomtheperson is affiliated

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource video info
información de los vídeos del recurso léxico conceptual
tool service info
información de herramientas y servicios
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together elements required for the description of tools and services.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource audio
ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
usage report
informe de uso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Reports on the research papers documenting the usage of a resource, either in a structured form or in free text.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: propietario de los derechos de distribución
distribution rights holder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on a person or an organization that holds the distribution rights. The range and scope of distribution rights is defined in the distribution agreement. The distributor in most cases only has a limited licence to distribute the work and collect royalties on behalf of the licensor or the IPR holder and cannot give to any recipient of the work permissions that exceed the scope of the distribution agreement (e.g. to allow uses of the work that are not defined in the distribution agreement).
Ontología para el Catálogo de Recursos Lingüísticos de ReTeLe (http://catalogo.retele.linkeddata.es/) a partir de Metashare.owl (http://purl.org/net/def/metashare)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: relation info
información de relaciones
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the relations of the resource being described with other resources.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre del departamento
department name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty/department, department/unit of a research organization or private company etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: validation report
informe de validación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A short account of the validation details or a link to the validation report.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: speech genre
género de los archivos de voz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conventionalized discourse of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria; the values here are intended only for speech.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la codificación de los caracteres
character encoding info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on character encoding of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: resource associated with
recurso vinculado con
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refers to another resource that the resource described uses for its operation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource audio info
información de los ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
language description text info
información de los textos de la gramática
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the text module of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.); it is obligatory for all language descriptions.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: localización de la ejecución
execution location
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any url where the service providing access to a resource is being executed.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nivel de codificación
ecoding level
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information on the contents of the lexicalConceptualResource as regards the linguistic level of analysis

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los ficheros de audio del corpus
corpus audio info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the audio module of a corpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del corpus
corpus info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on corpora of all media types.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: video classification info
información de la clasificación de los vídeos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on video genre of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: video genre
género de los vídeos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A first indication of type of video recorded.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de las imágenes
image classification info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the classification of the image corpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language variety info
información de las variedades del lenguaje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zip code
código postal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The zip code of the postal address of a person or organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
email
correo electrónico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The email address of a person or an organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: recurso fuente
original source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name, the identifier or the url of the original resources that were at the base of the creation process of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language info
información de las lenguas del recurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the languages represented in the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource video info
información de los vídeos del recurso léxico conceptual
información audiovisual del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the video part of the lexical conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: proyecto financiador
funding project
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the project that has funded the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de variedad de la lengua
language variety type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: user nature
naturaleza del usuario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conditions imposed by the nature of the user (for instance, a research use may have different implications depending on this).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: URL
URL
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g.LR, document etc.) is located

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información no textual
extra textual information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of the extratextual information contained in the lexicalConceptualResouce; can be used as an alternative to audio, image, videos etc. for cases where these are not considered an important part of the lcr.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño
size
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the SizeUnit measurement in form of a number

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource media part info
información de la parte multimedia del recurso léxico conceptual
identificador en META-SHARE
META-SHARE ID
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An unambiguous referent to the resource within META-SHARE.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: input info
información de los requisitos de entrada
información de entrada
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the input resource of a tool or service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: herramienta de aceso
access tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name or the identifier or the url of the tool used to access a resource (e.g. a corpus workbench).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del corpus
corpus info
Groups together information on corpora of all media types.
información de codificación de caracteres
character encoding info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on character encoding of the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text classification info
información de la clasificación de los textos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: herramienta de creación
creation tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name, the identifier or the url of the tool used in the creation process linked component.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text format info
información del formato de texto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: International Standard Language Resource Number
ISLRN
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ISLRN

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información numérica de los textos del corpus
corpus text numerical info
Groups together information on the textNumerical component of a corpus. It is used basically for the textual representation of measurements and observations linked to sensorimotor recordings.
modo de creación
creation mode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies whether the resource is created automatically or in manual or interactive mode.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genéro de los ficheros de audio
audio genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A first indication of type of sounds recorded.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguality type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: clasificación por número de lenguas
Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidad de medida del tamaño
size unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de finalización de la creación
creation end date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date in which the creation process was completed

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: registrador
recorder
grabadora
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information on the recorder(s) of the audio or video part of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documentation
documentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refers to papers, manuals, reports etc. describing the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: región
region
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the region, county or department as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de variedad de la lengua
language variety type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource image info
información de las imágenes del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the image part of the lexical/conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del dominio
domain info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informe de evaluación
evaluation record
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A bibliographical record of or link to a report describing the evaluation process, tool, method etc. of the tool or service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño por dominio
size per domain
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the size of resource parts per domain.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource text info
información de los textos del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the textual part of the lexical/conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: revisión
revision
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provides an account of the revisions in free text or a link to a document with revisions.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: license category
categorización de las licencias
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A way of classifying licences according to their conditions of use (CLARIN recommendation).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language description image info
información de las imágenes de las gramáticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the image module of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.), if there are any (e.g. for sign language grammars).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de uso
actual use info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on how the resource has already been used.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidad de información no textual
extra textual information unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The unit of the extratextual information contained in the lexical conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource audio info
información de los ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the audio part of the lexical/conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informacion de las anotaciones
annotation info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the annotated part(s) of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language description video info
información de los vídeos de la gramática
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the video parts of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.), if there are any (e.g. for sign language grammars).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: texto de la atribución
attribution text
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The text that must be quoted for attribution purposes when using a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language info
información de las lenguas del recurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the languages represented in the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: país
country
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the country mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization as defined in the list of values of ISO 3166.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: anotador
annotator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the annotators of the specific annotation type.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: resource short name
abreviatura del nombre del recurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The short form (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used to identify the resource; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: membership info
información de afiliación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conditions imposed by the user being member of some association/institution (e.g., ELRA, LDC) distributing the resource. This indicates the availability conditions (and prices) for users who are members or not.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata info
información de los metadatos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the metadata record itself.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del uso previsto del recurso
foreseen use info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the use for which the resource is created.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization info
información de la organización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on organizations related to the resource.

rdf:Description.dct:title: Apertium RDF
rdf:Description.dct:description: Apertium RDF is the linked data version of the Apertium family of bilingual dictionaries. It covers 22 dictionaries currently.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: image genre
género de las imágenes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A first indication of the genre of images.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text format info
información de los formatos del texto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licence info
información de la licencia del recurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on licences for the resource; can be repeated to allow for different modes of access and restrictions of use (e.g. free for academic use, on-a-fee basis for commercial use, download of a sample for free use etc.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño por lengua
size per language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provides information on the size per language component.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource text info
información de los textos del recurso léxico conceptual
update frequency
frecuencia de actualización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the frequency with which the resource is updated.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language variety info
información de las variedades del recurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: person info
información de la persona
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information relevant to persons related to the resource; to be used mainly for contact persons, resource creators, validators, annotators etc. for whom personal data can be provided.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: output info
información de salida
información de los requisitos de salida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the output of a tool or service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: validator
validador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the person(s) or the organization(s) that validated the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: titular de DPI
IPR holder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on a person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work within the META-SHARE network.

A person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work via a specific distributor.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization short name
nombre abreviado de la organización
abreviatura del nombre de la organización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tool documentation type
tipo de documentación de herramientas y servicios
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of documentation for tool or service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codificación de los caracteres
character encoding
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tool service info
información de herramientas y servicios
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together elements required for the description of tools and services.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los textos del corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: corpus text info
Groups together information on the text component of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medio de acceso o distribución
distribution access medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the medium (channel) used for delivery or providing access to the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nivel de codificación
encoding level
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information on the linguistic levels covered by the resource (grammar or lexical/conceptual resource).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: persona de contacto
contact person
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the person(s) that is/are responsible for providing further information regarding the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la documentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: document info

Groups information on all the documents reporting on various aspects of the resource (creation, usage etc.), published or unpublished; it is used in various places of the metadata schema depending on its role (e.g. usage report, validation report, annotation manual etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información no estructurada
document unstructured
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provides information on documents that report on the resource in form of free text.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: evaluator
evaluador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on person or organization that evaluated the tool or service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: license
licencia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The license of use for the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: según esquema de clasificación
conformance to classification scheme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the external classification schemes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los n-gramas de los textos del corpus
corpus text ngram info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information required for n-gram resources; information can be provided both as regards features drawn from the source corpus (e.g. language coverage, size, format, domains etc.) and features pertaining to the n-gram output itself (e.g. range of n-grams, type of item included, etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de inicio de creación
creation start date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date in which the creation process was started

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource image info
información de las imágenes del recurso léxico conceptual
información de dominio
domain info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text classification info
información de la clasificación de los textos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sistema de escritura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the writing system used to represent the language in form of a four letter code as it is defined in ISO-15924

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: detalles del método de creación
creation mode details
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provides further information on the creation methods and processes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo MIME
MIME type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (http://www.iana.org/)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language description info
información de las gramáticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on language descriptions (grammars).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the subtype of lexicalConceptualResource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codificación de caracteres
character encoding
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de gramática
language description type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of the language description

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telephone number
número de teléfono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The telephone number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource info
información del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information specific to lexical/conceptual resources.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization name
nombre de la organización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The full name of an organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguality type
clasificación por número de lenguas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: variedad de la lengua
nombre de la variedad de la lengua
language variety name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: validation info
información de validación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on validation of a resource; it can be repeated to allow for different validations (e.g. formal validation of the whole resource; content validation of one part of the resource etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre de la lengua
lengua
language name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A human understandable name of the language that is used in the resource or supported by the tool/service; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominio
domain
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the application domain of the resource or the tool/service

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: samples location
localización de las copias
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A url with samples of the resource or, in the case of tools, of samples of the output.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistic information
información lingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexicalConceptualResource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: actor
actor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to bring persons and organizations (in whatever role they may have with regard to the resource, e.g., resource creator, IPR holder, etc.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los vídeos del corpus
Corpus video info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: información de los componentes audivisuales del corpus
Groups together information on the video component of a corpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text genre
género de los textos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Genre: The conventionalized discourse or text types of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: referencia externa
external ref
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Another resource to which the lexicalConceptualResource is linked (e.g. link to a wordnet or ontology).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidad de medida del tamaño
size unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: theoretic model
modelo teórico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name of the theoretic model applied for the creation or enrichment of the resource, and/or reference (URL or bibliographic reference) to informative material about the theoretic model used.
